name: 雛菜
trans: Hey, Madoka-senpai.

name: 円香
trans: ...What.

name: 雛菜
trans: Why not let Hinana hold the umbrella～?

name: 円香
text:
いい
雛菜、真ん中で持たないから
trans:
It's fine.
Cos Hinana won't share it in between us.

name: 雛菜
trans: Hee～?

name: 円香
text:
雛菜が持ってた時、
肩、っていうか８割濡れた
trans:
Whenever Hinana holds it,
my shoulders would get wet 80% of the time.

name: 雛菜
trans:
Hm～
Really～?

name: 円香
trans: Really.

name: 雛菜
text:
……だけど
円香先輩もちゃんと持ててないでしょ～？
trans:
...But Madoka-senpai isn't holding it properly
too～?

name: 円香
trans: What makes you say that?

name: 雛菜
text:
傘、
雛菜の頭に当たってるんですけど～
trans:
Because the umbrella keeps hitting Hinana's
head～

name: 円香
trans: Lower your head then.

name: 雛菜
trans: Hee～...

name: 円香
text:
……
やっぱり一本じゃ無理
trans:
...
I guess an umbrella really isn't enough for the two of
us.

name: 円香
text: 行くよ、もう一軒。コンビニ
trans: Let's go get another. At the convenience store.

name: 雛菜
text:
ん～
このあたりにコンビニあった～？
trans:
Yea～
Are there any convenient stores around here?

name: 円香
trans: Isn't there any?

name: 雛菜
trans: Nope～

name: 雛菜
text: じゃあ止むまで、雨宿りする～？
trans: Then let's seek shelter until the rain stops～?

name: 円香
trans: Where?

name: 雛菜
text: そのへんのビルの下とか～？
trans: Like, under that building or somewhere～?

name: 円香
text:
じゃあ、そうすれば
私は傘で帰る
trans: In that case I'm going home with the umbrella.

name: 雛菜
trans: Hee～!?

name: 雛菜
text: 雨宿りするの、円香先輩でしょ～？
trans:
Shouldn't Madoka-senpai be the one that should
be waiting under the shelter～?

name: 雛菜
trans: Wah, what～～!?

name: 円香
text: 主導権どっちにあると思ってんの
trans: Who do you think is taking the lead here.

name: 雛菜
trans: It's Hinana's umbrella～!

name: 円香
trans: But the person who bought it was, me...!

name: 雛菜
trans:
Ah～...
Now I'm all soaked～...

name: 円香
trans: ...What.

name: 円香
text:
言うほど濡れてないじゃん
さっき雛菜が持ってた時の方が全然濡れたんだけど
trans:
You're not That wet.
I was soaked way worse when Hinana held it the 
last time.

name: 雛菜
trans:
Ah...
Over there to our left～

name: 円香
trans: A convenience store?

name: 雛菜
text:
ううん
ドラッグストアがあった気がする～
trans:
Nope.
I think there's a drug store there～

name: 円香
trans: You could have said so earlier.

name: 雛菜
trans: I just remembered～

name: 雛菜
text:
……雛菜、
今日お財布持ってないからね～？
trans: ...Hinana, forgot her wallet today, you know～?

name: 円香
text:
知ってる
さっきもコンビニで聞いた
trans:
I know.
You already said that in the convenience store just
now.

name: 円香
text: ……後日、利子つけて請求するから
trans:
...Worry not. I'll send a bill to you on a later date,
with interest.

name: 雛菜
text:
利子～～～？
円香先輩、悪徳金融～……
trans:
Interest～～～?
Madoka-senpai's an evil money lender～......

name: 円香
text: 雛菜が自分勝手な理由で逃げてもいいようにね
trans:
Though Hinana will just come up with a reason and get
get away with it anyways.

name: 雛菜
trans: What's that supposed to mean～

name: 円香
text:
たとえば交換日記
毎日交換するとは決まってないって止めてた
trans:
Remember the diary exchange?
You stopped exchanging cos you said we didn't
have a rule to exchange everyday.

name: 雛菜
trans:
Hee～?
Was that what happened～...?

name: 雛菜
trans: Hm～, but about that,

name: 雛菜
text:
最後、ほんとに止めたのは
円香先輩じゃなかった～？
trans:
wasn't Madoka-senpai the one that eventually
stopped the whole thing altogether?

name: 雛菜
text:
どうせいつか終わるんだから、
いつ終えたっていいでしょ～って
trans:
"We're going to end it someday, so it's fine to
end it anytime" was what you said～

name: 円香
trans: ...You sure remember it well.

name: 雛菜
trans:
Aha～
I guess～

name: 雛菜
text:
この間も円香先輩が
交換日記って言ってたから──
trans:
It's cos the other time time, Madoka-senpai
mentioned about the diary exchange, so──

name: 雛菜
text:
あ～～～！
ほら、ドラッグストアあった！
trans:
Ah～～～!
See, there really is a drug store here!

name: 円香
trans: Yea─

name: 雛菜
trans: Umbrella, umbrella～

name: 円香
trans: Ahh─... This is exhausting

name: 円香
trans: My arm hurts...
